results.title: Scabby mouth in sheep
results.brief_description: This film shows the troubles cased by this highly contagious disease in sheep, and explains methods of treatment and prevention by vaccination.

results.title: Sam Maloof: woodworker
results.brief_description: Sam Maloof is a craftsman who designs and builds his own furniture. The film demonstrates the working situation, methods and materials used by him. He talks of his philosophy in working with wood and the satisfaction he finds in his work.
results.description: Sam Maloof is a craftsman who designs and builds his own furniture. The film demonstrates the working situation, methods and materials used by him. He talks of his philosophy in working with wood and the satisfaction he finds in his work.

results.title: Salting the earth
results.brief_description: This video looks at the causes of both wetland and dryland salting, its effects and some solutions. No other credits available.

results.title: Sails of exploration
results.brief_description: Shows the historical development of water transportation by sail power, describing the role of such ships in discovering new lands, mapping the globe, and linking together the people of the world. Discusses the importance of the clipper ship in the early economic life of the United States. Includes re-enactments, drawings and archival film.

results.title: Safety in construction. Part 4. Mechanical aids
results.brief_description: Divided into two sections, the first part of this film demonstrates a number of unsafe work sites while the second part shows the acidents that could result when using mechanical aids and how to avoid these accidents.

results.title: Safety in ceramics
results.creator_credit: K Starbuck and Moorabbin College of TAFE
results.brief_description: Introduces basic safety precautions for a ceramic studio when using clay as a creative medium in the classroom. Addresses safety and health hazards inherent in clay dust, the kiln, glazes, electricity and tools.
